'''Mythcon 14''' was the fourteenth annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference. 

*'''Theme:''' "Mythic Structures in [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]], [[C.S. Lewis|Lewis]], and [[Charles Williams|Williams]]"
*'''Guests of Honor:''' [[Clyde S. Kilby|C.S. Kilby]] (Inklings scholar & curator) and Stephen R. Donaldson (fantasy author)
*'''Chairman:''' [[Glen GoodKnight]]
